items.sentence: China is the world's leading producer of rice.
Tom didn't eat the meal Mary prepared for him.
It never occurred to me that I might get hurt.
It never occurred to me that I might get shot.
How often do you hear wolves howling at night?
Why does Tom get to do that, but Mary doesn't?
Tom called Mary to tell her that he'd be late.
We don't want to leave the house before three.
I wasn't aware Tom wasn't supposed to do that.
There was nothing I could do but wait for Tom.
